str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To exercise self-control, be continent. Middle voice from egkrates; to exercise self-restraint.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To marry, used of either sex. From gamos; to wed.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Stronger, more excellent. Comparative of a derivative of kratos; stronger, i.e. better, i.e. Nobler.
To marry, used of either sex. From gamos; to wed.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: From pur; to kindle, i.e. to be ignited, glow, be refined, or to be inflamed.
